Time-series Forecasting using LLMCross-modality AlignmentAnomaly detection

About Me

I'm interested in applying LLMs to tasks in time series data, with a specific focus on anomaly detection and forecasting.

Research Interests

  • LLMs for Time-series
  • Alignment of Cross-modality such as time-series and natural language
  • Anomaly detection and imputation in manufacturing
